title: Pancakes
description: A simple and delicious breakfast option.
steps: Mix flour, milk, and eggs in a bowl.
Heat a frying pan and pour in a portion of the batter.
Cook on both sides until golden brown.

title: Tomato Soup
description: A warm and comforting tomato soup.
steps: Boil water in a pot, add the tomatoes and garlic.
Simmer for 20 minutes and blend until smooth.
